t: 1 Chronicles 25
The Musicians

David,*p together with the commanders of the army, set apart some of the sons of Asaph, Heman and Jeduthun for the ministry of prophesying, accompanied by harps, lyres and cymbals. Here is the list of the men who performed this service:
From*pln the sons of Asaph: Zakkur,*ld Joseph, Nethaniah and Asarelah. The sons of Asaph were under the supervision of Asaph, who prophesied under the king’s supervision.

As*ln for Jeduthun, from his sons: Gedaliah,*ld Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah and Mattithiah, six in all, under the supervision of their father Jeduthun, who prophesied, using the harp in thanking and praising the Lord.*s
As*ln for Heman, from his sons: Bukkiah,*ld Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shubael and Jerimoth; Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti and Romamti-Ezer; Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir and Mahazioth.
(All these were sons of Heman the king’s seer. They were given him through the promises of God to exalt him. God gave Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.)

All*p these men were under the supervision of their father for the music of the temple of the Lord,*s with cymbals, lyres and harps, for the ministry at the house of God. Asaph,*p Jeduthun and Heman were under the supervision of the king.
Along with their relatives—all of them trained and skilled in music for the Lord*s —they numbered 288.
Young and old alike, teacher as well as student, cast lots for their duties.
The*ple first lot, which was for Asaph, fell to Joseph, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg the*le second to Gedaliah, him*le and his relatives and sons 12*lg
the*le third to Zakkur, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le fourth to Izri, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le fifth to Nethaniah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le sixth to Bukkiah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le seventh to Jesarelah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le eighth to Jeshaiah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le ninth to Mattaniah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le tenth to Shimei, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le eleventh to Azarel, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le twelfth to Hashabiah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le thirteenth to Shubael, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le fourteenth to Mattithiah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le fifteenth to Jerimoth, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le sixteenth to Hananiah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le seventeenth to Joshbekashah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le eighteenth to Hanani, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le nineteenth to Mallothi, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le twentieth to Eliathah, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le twenty-first to Hothir, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
the*le twenty-second to Giddalti, his*le sons and relatives 12*lg
